title: A gas station attendant pointing out problems
context: Warn a driver that their tire looks flat or their oil is low.

content.bestLine: Your tire looks a bit flat, sir.

neutral.text: I think you've got a problem with your tire
You should check your tire pressure
I noticed your oil light is on
You might want to get that tire checked
Your car could use some maintenance

formal.text: I've noticed your tire appears to be underinflated
Your vehicle's oil level is below the recommended level
It's advisable to have your tire inspected
Your vehicle requires immediate attention to avoid damage
I recommend checking your tire pressure as soon as possible
The oil light on your dashboard indicates a potential issue

patterns.meaning: Pointing out a specific issue with the vehicle
Advising the driver to take action

dialogs.description: A gas station attendant warning a driver about a flat tire

lines.speaker: Attendant
lines.text: You've got a flat tire, sir.

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: Oh, I hadn't noticed. Thank you for telling me.

dialogs.description: A gas station attendant informing a driver about low oil

lines.speaker: Attendant
lines.text: I noticed your oil light is on. You should get that checked.

lines.speaker: Driver
lines.text: I'll make sure to stop by a mechanic soon. Thanks for letting me know.
